'''1.18.2''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on December 9, 2021, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4416080068109|title=Minecraft - 1.18.2 (Bedrock)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=December 9, 2021}}</ref> This version is compatible with all Bedrock platforms running on [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.0|1.18.0]] and [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.1|1.18.1]]. This is the final version released in 2021.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue that affected some large world saves on PlayStation, resulting in corrupted textures and loss of data, in some cases ({{bug|MCPE-149193}})
* Interacting with certain containers will once again properly open the inventory screen ({{bug|MCPE-148531}})
* Fixed issue where breaking blocks, opening chests, and entering portals would be delayed/not work when there are lots of mobs nearby ({{bug|MCPE-149214}})
* Fixed some worlds not correctly replacing Bedrock with Deepslate after upgrading to 1.18 ({{bug|MCPE-149251}})
